name: Mexican Street Corn
description: Mexican street corn (a.k.a. “Elotes”) is a bold way to grill corn! Get a good char on the kernels before slathering with a cheese-spiked sauce and lots of fresh lime. Traditional recipes use mayo, spices, and Cotija cheese. Streamline and use Cheesy Fries Seasoning as the base and swap mayo for protein-rich Greek yogurt.

ingredients.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning or Lemon Pepper Seasoning

preparation: Place corn on grill; cover and barbecue 10–15 min, turning often, until kernels are lightly charred.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk yogurt, sour cream, and seasoning. Slice lime and squeeze juice into bowl.
Using Basting Brush, generously brush grilled corn with sauce. Sprinkle with toppings, if desired.
tips: To save time, precook corn in the microwave! Place the unshucked cobs in Multipurpose Steamer, cover, and microwave on high for 5 min before grilling. Using oven mitts, gently grip tip of corn with one hand and squeeze. It will cleanly pop out of husks, leaving the sticky, silky threads behind. Then, quickly char on the grill!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup chopped vegetables.

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favorite.

products.name: Basting Brush (1006236)
summary: This silicone brush is perfect for grilling, roasting & baking.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
